name: email_projects
description: Email templates for Wolff Creative photography studio plus portfolio showcase. Production templates handle client bookings, payments, and gallery delivery. Portfolio section demonstrates advanced email development skills (interactive, animations, dark mode). MJML-based with HTML output. Real business tools and technical showcase combined.

scripts.build: mkdir -p dist/transactional dist/campaigns dist/portfolio && mjml transactional/*.mjml -o dist/transactional && mjml campaigns/*.mjml -o dist/campaigns && mjml portfolio/*.mjml -o dist/portfolio
scripts.build:watch: mjml -w transactional/*.mjml -o dist/transactional & mjml -w campaigns/*.mjml -o dist/campaigns & mjml -w portfolio/*.mjml -o dist/portfolio
scripts.dev: npm run build && concurrently "npm run build:watch" "npm run preview"
